title: Reckless Obsession
description: Observe the clash between true love and the illusion of self-deception that’s certain to be your next book club recommendation.Jaxson just wants to enjoy life with sexy women, fast cars, & money. Moral sense is an unfamiliar concept. When he rescues a beautiful woman, his wicked ways devour her. The intensity between them is undeniable. She is unable to refuse his invitation to move into his home for her safety.Jennifer perceives Jaxson as her romantic protector against the forces who are after her. Turns out, he supplies more danger when he fails to shield her from the insanity that is Amanda. Her life is now at risk from inside the house as well.Jaxson’s childhood companion has a hold over him. He’s her one constant grasp on reality. When he neglects to keep her reined in, she depends on her delusions to guide her instead. Amanda’s been addicted to unrestricted access to Jaxson over the years.Just how powerful is their bond? Is Jaxson prepared to sacrifice it?The tug of war between two women sends Jaxson into a tailspin. To please them both can prove fatal…Dive into Reckless Obsession, a mind-blowing thriller where the love triangle takes on new meaning today.
author: Theresa Papa
